#!/bin/bash
# Elasticsearch Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## Install Requirements

apt update
apt install -y jq ca-certificates gnupg2 wget tar curl

cd /mnt/server

## Install Elasticsearch
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-$VERSION-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -zxf elasticsearch-*-linux-x86_64.tar.gz --directory /mnt/server
mv elasticsearch*/* /mnt/server
rm elasticsearch-*-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
rm -R elasticsearch-*

## Finish command
echo "All done! Just start it up :)"
